subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: As the Islanders try to win their first playoff series since 1993, the team focuses on its coming game — Monday’s series finale in Washington — instead of a possible matchup against the Rangers.
snippet: As the Islanders try to win their first playoff series since 1993, the team focuses on its coming game — Monday’s series finale in Washington — instead of a possible matchup against the Rangers.
